txt.en:
'I am very glad to have your assistance in this matter, [placeholder]. In order to give our lure the proper texture, we will need food similar to what our prey eats normally.

'The creatures we investigated earlier seem to eat a peculiar fish only found down here in the Water-works -- Three-spined Stickleback.  

'If you are an accomplished fisherman, you may use your skills in angling to catch these rare fish. Bring me a fair number of these, and I'll add it to our collection.'
'Well done, [placeholder]! Your contribution is greatly appreciated.\n\n'Be sure to speak with me again if you have more ingredients to add to the pile.'
'Have you gathered the materials I requested, [placeholder]?'
Baiting the Beast:  Putting Meat on the Bones
Hasta is asking that anyone willing to help him should gather the various ingredients necessary to draw forth the menace from beneath the Water-works.
Three-spined Sticklebacks can be fished from the Water-works.\n\nHasta would like you to bring him five Three-spined Sticklebacks.
